vlive.english: Kind and nice, like a boyfriend?

examples.korean: I think amiableness is one of the qualities of a good person. 발음듣기 내 생각에 상냥함은 좋은 사람의 자질 중 하나이다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: I think amiableness is one of the qualities of a good person. 발음

examples.korean: Face your deficiencies and acknowledge them; but do not let them master you. Let them teach you patience, sweetness, insight. (Helen Keller) 발음듣기 당신의 약점들을 직면하고 인정하라. 하지만 그것이 당신을 지배하게 하지 말라. 그것으로 하여금 당신에게 참을성, 상냥함, 통찰력을 가르치도록 하라. (헬렌 켈러, 자기관리명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Face your deficiencies and acknowledge them; but do not let them master you. Let them teach you patience, sweetness, insight. (Helen Keller) 발음

examples.korean: Her beauty comes from her affability. 발음듣기 그녀의 아름다움은 그녀의 상냥함으로부터 비롯된다. English Hidden Card
examples.english: Her beauty comes from her affability. 발음

examples.korean: Besides being an amazingly talented artist, however, he was also known as a man of remarkable affability and friendliness. 발음듣기 하지만, 놀라울 정도로 재능 있는 예술가라는 것 외에도, 그는 또한 눈에 띄는 상냥함과 친근감으로도 알려져 있습니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Besides being an amazingly talented artist, however, he was also known as a man of remarkable affability and friendliness. 발음

examples.korean: The questions were designed to test the five main personality traits: extroversion, agreeableness, emotional stability, conscientiousness, and intelligence. 발음듣기 이 질문들은 외향성, 상냥함, 감정적 안정성, 양심적임, 그리고 지적임 등 다섯 가지의 주요 성격적인 특성을 테스트하기 위해 고안된 것입니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: The questions were designed to test the five main personality traits: extroversion, agreeableness, emotional stability, conscientiousness, and intelligence. 발음
